cast.overview: The story of Nina, a ballerina in a New York City ballet company whose life, like all those in her profession, is completely consumed with dance. She lives with her retired ballerina mother Erica who zealously supports her daughter's professional ambition. When artistic director Thomas Leroy decides to replace prima ballerina Beth MacIntyre for the opening production of their new season, Swan Lake, Nina is his first choice.
cast.title: Black Swan

cast.overview: In the not-too-distant future, the aging gene has been switched off. To avoid overpopulation, time has become the currency and the way people pay for luxuries and necessities. The rich can live forever, while the rest struggle to negotiate for their immortality. A poor young man who suddenly comes into a fortune of time finds himself on the run from a corrupt police force known as the "time keepers".
cast.title: In Time

details.biography: Toby Hemingway was born on May 28, 1983 in Brighton, England as Toby Michael C.A. Hemingway. He is an actor, known for The Covenant (2006), Black Swan (2010) and In Time (2011).
details.name: Toby Hemingway
